question: [Study] Norsk: Oppgi the slope of the noisy line for linjen som vises.

qas.question: [Study] Norsk: Oppgi the slope of the noisy line for linjen som vises.
[Explain] English: Identify the intercept of the noisy line for the plotted line.
[Practice] English: Identify the value of y when x equals 1 for the plotted line.
